activities: TRX Data Services, TRX Technologies Services. TRX also operates the software that runs client reporting, which is accessible via the website www.trx.com.  All such software and the TRX.COM website are referred to as the ("Site").  TRX.COM allows the general public to access www.trx.com but limits the access to personal information to users approved for client reporting. TRX, Inc and its subsidiaries, TRX Fulfillment, TRX Data Services, and TRX Technologies are members of Safe Harbor and will adhere to Safe Harbor regulations.

personaldata: On-Line, HR Data, customer and client data
